director.name: 朱利安·布雷切 Julian Breece

introduction: 本片是由4部短片组成，网上暂无本片资源。The seventh installment of the successful Boys Life series. Four Short Films selected from the Sundance Film Festival. Each film is uniquely auteur driven and reflects an exuberant new emerging talent. THE YOUNG AND EVIL An intellectual, but troubled black student sets out to seduce an older black man. SPOKANE A straight guy meets an openly gay man at a wedding and finds himself the willing subject of a seduction that turns into an awkward night in a motel room. FIRST DATE A volatile ex-con will stop at nothing to keep a date with the underage boy he met online. A darkly comic fable about twists of fate. RAW LOVE The chronicles of two friends at the end of high school and the secret love that is threatened by the closing of the school year.
